list.name: Änderungen
list.comment:
Add IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files
This commit adds `.idea` configuration files to the project, including settings for PHP, VCS, and workspace preferences. These changes establish a consistent development environment in IntelliJ IDEA and ensure proper integration with version control.

task.summary:
Add IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files
This commit introduces configuration files for the project in IntelliJ IDEA, including module, PHP, VCS, and other settings. These files ensure proper IDE setup and version control integration while excluding unnecessary files through `.gitignore`.

Fix file upload validation in createUniqeCodes function
Previously, the code did not properly validate the uploaded file, potentially causing issues when no file or an invalid input was provided. This update ensures that `formDataObj.addFileField` is both a valid `File` object and has a non-empty name before proceeding.

Fix strict equality checks and clean up redundant code
Updated equality operators to use strict comparison (===) for better type safety. Simplified the return statement in `createOutputFile` by removing an unnecessary variable. These changes improve code consistency and maintainability.

Add IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files
This commit introduces `.idea` configuration files, including settings for PHP, VCS, and workspace preferences. These changes ensure proper IntelliJ IDEA setup for project development and integration while maintaining consistency across environments.

Add IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files
This commit adds `.idea` configuration files to the project, including settings for PHP, VCS, and workspace preferences. These changes establish a consistent development environment in IntelliJ IDEA and ensure proper integration with version control.

MESSAGE.value:
Add IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files
This commit introduces configuration files for the project in IntelliJ IDEA, including module, PHP, VCS, and other settings. These files ensure proper IDE setup and version control integration while excluding unnecessary files through `.gitignore`.

Fix file upload validation in createUniqeCodes function
Previously, the code did not properly validate the uploaded file, potentially causing issues when no file or an invalid input was provided. This update ensures that `formDataObj.addFileField` is both a valid `File` object and has a non-empty name before proceeding.

Fix strict equality checks and clean up redundant code
Updated equality operators to use strict comparison (===) for better type safety. Simplified the return statement in `createOutputFile` by removing an unnecessary variable. These changes improve code consistency and maintainability.

Add IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files
This commit introduces `.idea` configuration files, including settings for PHP, VCS, and workspace preferences. These changes ensure proper IntelliJ IDEA setup for project development and integration while maintaining consistency across environments.

Add IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files
This commit adds `.idea` configuration files to the project, including settings for PHP, VCS, and workspace preferences. These changes establish a consistent development environment in IntelliJ IDEA and ensure proper integration with version control.
